data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Bjelovarska-Bilogorska, Croatia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Bjelovarska-Bilogorska will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Bjelovarska-Bilogorska. Through your servants plant 21 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
